root: ^As you approach the house of the lumberjack, you notice a few people standing near the door.
^"Andrey, open the door! We know you're there!"
^You can see that the men are armed, and they don't look too friendly. As you approach them, they notice you.
^"Well, well, who do we have here? Are you lost, kiddo?"
^"I'm looking for the lumberjack, and I think you know where he is."

Asked: ^"You look like you do have something in your pouch. And I think we're gonna take it. Get 'em, boys."
Trouble: ^"Well, I think trouble has found you. Get 'em, boys."
Fight: ^"If you're looking for a fight... I think we can deliver."
